name: Robostar
description:
This is the first level of Robostar. We're currently working on building the rest of the game, but we've released this to show off the progress we've made.

Robostar is being built for fun, not for money, so shares and feedback are the most valuable currency to us right now. It would mean a lot to us if you left us comments letting us know what you enjoyed most and least, or if you especially enjoyed it, shared it with your friends.

Title music: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/RoccoW__xyce/~/RoccoW_en_De_Jongens_Met_de_Zwa...
Sound effects: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
